short_summary: Services of electrician journeyman and apprentice
description: providing services of electrician journeyman and apprentice for correctional institutions
full_summary:
### Solicitation for Services of Electrician Journeyman and Apprentice

**Reference Number:** cb-531-7987260

**Amendment Number:** 2

**Procurement Number:** 21301-25-4663307

**Publication Date:** March 5, 2024

**Tender Closing Date:** April 15, 2024, 2:00 PM

**Trade Agreement:** The solicitation is covered under the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), as well as free trade agreements with Chile, Colombia, Honduras, Panama, and Peru.

**Categories:** Service (SRV)

**Procurement Method:** Competitive - Open Bidding

**Key Deliverable:** The provision of Electricity and Electrician Apprentice services to Correctional Service Canada (CSC) institutions in Quebec, with the possibility of multiple Standing Offer awards. The contractor will provide qualified electricians and apprentices, as well as necessary tools for electrical work.

**Election and Solicitation:** The solicitation will be conducted under a Low-Priced Compliant Bid (LPCB) framework, allowing any interested supplier to submit a bid.

**Aboriginal Policy:** This procurement is not subject to any set-asides for Indigenous Suppliers.

**Security:** The solicitation does not include security requirements.

**Area affected:** The services will be required at all CSC institutions in the Quebec region.

**Contracting Authority:**

* **Name:** Kim Lavallée
* **Contact Information:**
	+ Email: [kim.lavallee@csc-scc.gc.ca](mailto:kim.lavallee@csc-scc.gc.ca)
	+ Telephone: (514) 235-9156

**Attachments:**

* Solicitation: [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/33558/4663307_rfso.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/33558/4663307_rfso.pdf)

* Specifications: [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/33558/4663307
